item.title: Trump says he’s fired Fed governor Lisa Cook, in move to control U.S. central bank’s board
item.description: The action could cause investors to question the independence of the U.S. central bank and face legal obstacles.

item.title: Apple no longer innovates — it waits. And with AI, anyone playing it safe will get left behind.
item.description: Apple is blowing its chance for AI leadership — but what else would you expect?

item.title: I am a 65-year old single woman with 25 credit cards. How do I cancel them without hurting my credit score?
item.description: “I pay them off each month if I use them and don’t run a balance.”
